mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (board_no, seller_no, cus_no, content, is_like, write_date, is_del) VALUES (#{board_no}, #{seller_no}, #{cus_no}, #{content}, 0, NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, c.nickname, c.profile_image FROM reply r JOIN customer c ON r.cus_no = c.id WHERE r.board_no = #{board_no} AND r.is_del = 0 ORDER BY r.write_date DESC LIMIT 1
